meanings.definition: Lipotropins: hormones that promote the breakdown of fat in the body.
meanings.sent1: The lipotropins help in breaking down fat for energy.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study lipotropins to understand how they affect fat metabolism.
meanings.sent3: The lipotropins had a party in the fat cells, celebrating their fat-burning abilities.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like lipotropins, breaking down obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The image of lipotropins attacking fat cells stuck in my mind.
